'''Hafshejan''' ({{lang-fa|هفشجان}}, also [[Romanize]]d as '''Hafshejān''' and '''Hafeshjān'''; also known as '''Hosheh Gūn''', '''Hushegūn''', and '''Jasteh Jūn''')<ref>{{GEOnet3|-3065354}}</ref> is a city in the [[Central District (Shahrekord County)|Central District]] of [[Shahrekord County]], [[Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province]], [[Iran]]. At the time of the 2016 census, its population was 21,352, in 6,655 families
Hafshejan has existed for around 9000 years.<ref>Zagarell, A. (1982). The Prehistory of the Northeast Bakhtiari Mountains, Iran “The Rise of a Highland Way of Life</ref> This region in the [[Gajjar]] time was under the domination of [[Bakhtiari people|Bakhtiaris]], but after stabilization of central power, the power of the Bakhtiaris was reduced.
Locals call this city Hoshegoon or Heyshegoon.
Historically, many people in Hafshejani were char-va-dar, which means a person who owns [[pack animal]]s and carries goods for trading. Others were [[farmer]]s and used the waters of several springs to grow their crops. Later it became famous in Iran for its skillful welders.
== Geography == One of the most well-known places in Hafshejan is a spring called Cheshme Zane; the name means eyes of birth or eyes at birth - implying a new and beautiful site to behold. <gallery> رگه های خشت و گل تپه اسکندری هفشجان.jpg|9000 years streak of mud Eskandari Hafshejan hill </gallery>
===Zaneh Hafshejan fountain walkway=== Hafshejan walkway is in the [[Mount Jahanbin|Jahanbin]] mountain range and is located 2  km from Hafshejan and 20  km from Kord. On Nature Day each year, more than 10 thousand people visit the park fountain.<ref>{{Cite news|url=http://www.tasnimnews.com/Home/Single/391418|title=چهارمحال و بختیاری بام ایران ، سرزمین هزار چشمه + تصاویر - اخبار تسنیم - Tasnim|work=خبرگزاری تسنیم - Tasnim|access-date=2018-05-08|language=fa}}</ref>
A walkway extends from the main [[Tourist attraction]] near the current centre of [[Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province]], [[Shahr-e Kord]].
Water is routed from the fountain to the agricultural plains 20 kilometres south of Branch and north of the mountain barrier between the world and 3  km from the city. The earthen dam has a clay core, and the reservoir has a volume of 1.3 million cubic meters. The dam crest's length is 410 m and the crest's width is 8 m, with a height of 42 meters in the deepest area.<ref>[http://www.tasnimnews.com/Home/Single/391418 «چهارمحال و بختیاری بام ایران، سرزمین هزار چشمه + تصاویر»]</ref>
==Elamite brick== [[File:کتیبه_عیلامی_میانه_هفشجان.png|Hafshejan Elamite brick was discovered at Scandary hills of Hafshejan|thumb|205x205px]] The [[Hafshejan Elamite brick]] carries the ancient scrolls of Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province. After the inscription is written Hafshejan. This brick has a width of 15 cm, a diameter of 8 cm, and has 26 lines. It was created more than 3100 years ago (1120 BC. M.). The brick was discovered in the province of Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province in the afternoon Elamite shows<ref>{{Cite web |url=http://www.chn.ir/NSite/FullStory/News/?Id=71880&Serv=0&SGr=0 |title=Archived copy |access-date=2016-07-10 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160822213420/http://www.chn.ir/NSite/FullStory/News/?Id=71880&Serv=0&SGr=0 |archive-date=2016-08-22 |url-status=dead |df= }}</ref>
